metaPixel.title: Meta Pixel Settings
metaPixel.subtitle: Configure Meta Pixel codes for tracking on your public forms
metaPixel.infoMessage: Meta Pixel codes are automatically inserted into public forms based on Market Type and Target Market. Each combination can only be configured once.
metaPixel.pixelCodePlaceholder: Paste your complete Meta Pixel code here...
metaPixel.pixelCodeHelp: Complete Meta Pixel code from your Meta Business Manager

errors.duplicateConfiguration: A configuration for this market type and target market already exists
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save Meta Pixel configuration
errors.deleteFailed: Failed to delete Meta Pixel configuration
